Visualizing EI (density)

Source: R/plot_density.R
plot_density.Rd

Visualizing EI (density)

Usage

plot_density(ei.object, options = list(parameter = "betab"))

Arguments

ei.object

The output of ei()

options

The list of options

  • parameter: A parameter to plot. It takes either betab or betaw.

Value

a ggplot object

Examples

data(matproii)
suppressMessages({
  ei_res <- ei(formula = t ~ x, total = "n", data = matproii)
})
plot_density(ei_res, options = list(parameter = "betab"))

plot_density(ei_res, options = list(parameter = "betaw"))
